channel.title: Key Vault on Marczak.IO
channel.description: Adam Marczak blog created for purpose of personal contribution and sharing knowledge to communities everywhere.

item.title: Automating Enterprise Azure billing using Logic Apps for 0.03$/month
item.description: Started up as manual extraction, evolved into PowerShell scripts, serverless Functions and ended up as Logic Apps. Read how this great service solved our business need for just 3 cents a month.
